msg: Removed obsolete methods from EventSource and BaseEventSource.

author: oheger
msg: Removed obsolete methods related to error listeners.

author: oheger
msg: Removed methods for adding and removing error listeners.
Instead, addEventListener() and removeEventListener() have been overridden.

author: oheger
msg: Removed methods for adding error listeners from BasicConfigurationBuilder.
Error events are now propagated via regular event listeners.
